patterns.page_structure: All pages use 'use client' directive with useAuth hook for authentication
patterns.auth_provider: AuthContext provides user, session, userRole, isLoading states via useAuth() hook
patterns.data_fetching: Use supabase client from lib/supabase/client.ts for database queries
patterns.styling: Existing dashboard pages use inline styles OR Tailwind classes via shadcn/ui components
patterns.ui_components: Shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Badge, Table, Dialog) with cn() utility for class merging
patterns.middleware: Protected routes are defined in middleware.ts protectedRoutes array
patterns.routing: Dashboard pages use (dashboard) route group with role-specific folders (worker/business)

existing_implementations.description: Existing worker jobs page at app/app/(dashboard)/worker/jobs/page.tsx shows dashboard structure with stats cards and uses inline styling for layout

ui_components_available.Button: Variants: default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link

considerations.language: Indonesian language used in existing UI (e.g., 'Keluar', 'Memproses...', 'Selamat datang')
considerations.authentication: Middleware requires authentication - add new route to protectedRoutes array
considerations.rsvp: Real-time updates via Supabase realtime could be added but not required for MVP
